meanings.definition: The act of treating with kindness or condescension
meanings.sent1: Her patronizations towards the new employee made him feel welcome and appreciated.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's patronizations towards the students created a positive learning environment.
meanings.sent3: The cat's patronizations towards the mouse were amusing to watch as they played together.
meanings.sent4: His patronizations towards the stray dogs in the neighborhood showed his compassionate nature.
meanings.sent5: The patronizations of the elderly lady towards the children were heartwarming and genuine.

meanings.definition: The act of being a regular customer or supporter of a business or organization
meanings.sent1: His patronizations of the local bakery helped keep the business thriving.
meanings.sent2: She showed her patronizations by always choosing to buy from the same small shop.
meanings.sent3: The robot's patronizations of the repair shop were comical as it kept coming back for fixes.
meanings.sent4: The tree's patronizations of the sunlight allowed it to grow tall and strong.
meanings.sent5: The community's patronizations of the library ensured its doors remained open for all.
